<HERO_of_enid@yahoogroups.com>

Subject: [Unschooling-dotcom] Free Math Software

offer

HSC

messages.subject: Free Math Software
messages.msgSnippet: An offer to share.....--Julie Miller in OK All homeschoolers are welcome to a free copy of the Softbasics Math Tri-Pak. These 3 programs are for children ages
messages.messageBody:
An offer to share.....--Julie Miller in OK

All homeschoolers are welcome to a free copy of the Softbasics Math Tri-Pak.
These 3 programs are for children ages 6-12 and work on Windows 95/98 with
an ink jet required for printable activities. The $24.95 price has been
waived and Softbasics will ship a copy to anyone who requests through e-mail
(a small s&h fee is required only after successful installation.) This offer
may be acccessed through Homeschool Central www.homeschoolcentral.com by
clicking on the Free Math Software banner on the first page. A review by HSC
is posted as well.



Scott Cary - Softbasics
